title: Sensitive Information Leaking Through Navy Website. [█████]
content:
Summary:
While performing recon work on websites owned by DoD i came up with a Navy website which is leaking sensitive information.
Description:
The website is leaking information such as- first name and last name, email address, phone number, location, rank, and other information of trainees in a clear readable pdf document. This is a high severity issue and requires immediate fixation. It is also a clear privacy violation and insufficient protection mechanism involved in data storage.
Step-by-step Reproduction Instructions
Open a web browser of your choice.
Now open this URL: https://███████/sites/██████/Documents/health-promotion-wellness/reproductive-and-sexual-health/██████████
Suggested Mitigation/Remediation Actions
Remove document from the internet or put applicable authorization mechanism(s) in order to access sensitive documents.
Impact
Any person can access this document and cause:
Information leakage.
Impersonation a person.
Commit crimes under a fake identity.
steps: Open a web browser of your choice.
vuln_description: The Navy website is leaking sensitive information such as first name, last name, email address, phone number, location, rank, and other details of trainees in a publicly accessible PDF document. This constitutes a high-severity information disclosure vulnerability and a privacy violation due to insufficient access controls.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it involves accessing a publicly exposed URL with no authentication or authorization checks. The sensitive document is directly accessible without any complex steps or manipulation of application states.
